snippet: Civil rights advocate Cornel West was among those who were arrested on Oct. 21 during a demonstration against the police department’s stop-and-frisk policy.
abstract: Twenty protesters, including civil rights advocate Prof Cornel West, are convicted of disorderly conduct during Oct 21 demonstration over New York City Police Department's controversial stop-and-frisk policy.
lead_paragraph: Civil rights advocate Cornel West was among those who were arrested on Oct. 21 during a demonstration against the police department’s stop-and-frisk policy.

headline.seo: Convictions for 20 Protesters Who Blocked a Police Doorway
headline.main: Convictions for 20 Protesters Who Blocked a Police Doorway
headline.print_headline: Convictions for 20 Protesters Who Blocked a Police Doorway
